title: [Discussion] Is it possible for both of us to get the same room in 1st year boys' hostel
content: Hi! Me and my friend are freshers joining PES Ring Road. Is it possible for both of us to get the same room in 1st year boys' hostel?

comments.body: You guys have to go at the same time for allotment, even after that you arent guaranteed. Just go at the same time and ask them if you can get the same room, if any room is available with 2 free beds theyll mostly give u
No u can't it's assigned randomly
It's not assigned randomly, you have the choice to choose your roommates
